tool.name: IMAGINE-X Analysis

param.name: keep_hd
param.label: Keep H/D atoms in reference structure

param.name: b0_over_b1
param.label: b0/b1
param.help: Ratio of physical constants involved in the scattering length of polarized H

param.name: use_coverage
param.label: Use coverage
param.help: Whether to use a coverage mtz file.

param.name: use_intensity
param.label: Use intensity
param.help: Whether to use an intensity array.

param.label: Array name
param.name: array
param.help: Must match a Miller array label from input mtz files.

param.name: use_phasing
param.label: Use phasing hint
param.help: Whether to provide an mtz file as a phasing hint.

param.name: use_honly
param.label: Use H only file
param.help: Whether to provide an mtz file with only H.
